summary:
Executive Consultant - Viviane, Yan Liu
Email - vivianeliu@kexin.nl
Mobile - 31 0 686061839
Skype - kexininfo
KVK NO. 59220538

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
After having gained over 10 years of experience in multi-culture enterprises in MRP area throughout China and the Asia Pacific Region. I showed my strong interest in Human Resource and sucessfully crossed this area with my talent based in Shanghai and Rotterdam.I joined KEXIN Consultancy and was assigned as the Business Development Director in 2013 to focus Dutch and European marketing.

Fluent in Mandarin, Shanghainese, English. Basic communication in Dutch. Happy to communicate in a multi-culture circumstance. Strong sense of customer demand understanding. I managed company establishment and built up an impressive client base and candidate pool.

As an executive consultant, through my extensive experience I excel in executive-search placements for Top-Level positions in multiple industries, using my wide network and understanding of General Management, Sales & Marketing, Finance, Human Resources and Operational Management.

Specialties: 
- Over 15 years of multi-culture enterprise working experience.
- Well understanding of mult-culture influence in a business.
- Sense of strategy and comfortable communication with varieties of customers, sales, suppliers and management.
- Strong focus on getting the job done by strictly following the Executive Search process, dedication towards tasks, and a strong sense of high quality services
- Driven by quality and dedication, and focusing on Win-Win relationships and long-lasting partnerships

profile_positions.description:
Privately Held; 5-10 employees; Human Resources industry

Kexin Consultancy is a Chinese consulting company based in Rotterdam, the Netherlands. We are specialized in the Human Resource services and solutions throughout the Netherlands and Europe. We provide service to both enterprises and individuals. Recruiting and Executive Search are the core service to enterprise clients. Interview training, CV Check and job recommendation are the service to individuals.



We have a strong reputation build up by strictly following the Executive Search process, dedication towards tasks, and a strong sense of high quality services: 
- Consultant is an expert in his or her practice area 
- World class research team 
- Mapping the full potential pool of candidates to ensure that only the most qualified candidates are hired
profile_positions.title: Executive Consultant & Partner

profile_positions.description:
Focuses on the recruitment (heading hunting) of middle to senior level management positions as well as senior technical talents for industries of Energy, IT and Pharmaceutical.

- Executive Search
- New Energy
- IT Industry (including ERP, Gaming)
- Pharmaceutical

Job Description
1.	Candidates and clients data maintain and update.
2.	Seeking, interview and recommend appropriate candidates per client’s JD and further requirement.
3.	Talents training, career consultancy and on-board follow up.
4.	Necessary reports support based on search, interview and success case.
5.	Prepare candidate profile and comment based on face to face or skype video interviews.
6.	Case negotiation.
7.	Customer relationships maintain.
8.	Client visiting and presentation execution. Developing new clients and target new recruitment contract agreement in the territory.
9.	Trade show involvement.
profile_positions.title: Executive Recruiting Consultant @ Netherlands

profile_positions.description:

profile_positions.title: Commercial Coordination Manager

profile_positions.description:
Principal Tasks Supporting G.M. to make plan of daily schedule and work. Preparing the weekly & monthly plan based on the company schedule, meanwhile, keeping a flexible “bridge” internally and externally. 
1 Daily administration management 
2 Schedule management, reminding and supporting
3 Filing management, entry and translate

5 Business trip arrangement lChoice and book ticket reasonable
6 Visitor handling
